name: The plate-armour of sole judgement
data: It increases the users wisdom adequately.
It increases the users intelligence adequately.
It has magnificent armour class for its type (excellent in general).
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users electric resistance somewhat.
It increases the users fire resistance somewhat.
It increases the users acid resistance somewhat.
It increases the users cold resistance somewhat.
It gives small bonus to the spell 'flesh rot'.
It gives small bonus to the spell 'suffocation'.
